channel.title: Client GameFrame, And Etc
channel.description:
I way wondering if someone could help me make my client look old-school like, i have the inventory sprite and the chat box back sprites i currently need the tab icon's EG: Bookbag, prayer icon, music icon, logout etc.. if someone (preferably experienced) could help me redo my game-frame and help with the coding involved.
Someone, Please & Thank You.
